title: 38: No Such Thing As A Super Mario Love Hotel
content: In the first international live episode at the Brussels Atomium, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) Anna (@nosuchthing) and special guest Lieven Scheire (@lievenscheire) discuss love huts, space pizzas, door-based ants, and rehab for drunk birds.
contentSnippet: In the first international live episode at the Brussels Atomium, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) Anna (@nosuchthing) and special guest Lieven Scheire (@lievenscheire) discuss love huts, space pizzas, door-based ants, and rehab for drunk birds.
